inclusion.criterion: Males or females with severe AD dementia (MMSE<12) between the ages of 70 to 90 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: If on any of the following medications: acetylcholinesterase inhibitors and/or memantine, participants must be on a stable dose for at least 60 days.
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Clinically stable for at least 3 months.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current or past history of malignancy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical or imaging evidence of stroke (with more than 1-2 lacunar infarcts on CT scan or MRI).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major depression, bipolar affective disorder or psychosis.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 15 year old girl with the history of recurrent bilateral headache. She has been diagnosed with migraine headache and is under treatment.
